english.segment1: My life is plagued. By mistakes, broken love, slaps in the face. But I'm trying to care, to dare to embrace your face
english.segment2: Hug him like a brother. Kiss her like a sister. Let it be my mother for now
english.segment3: I want to find where the maid in the street. Is pouring her wine. I heard she takes you in and gives you the words. You need said
english.segment4: If you'll be her brother. She'll kiss you like a sister. She'll even be your mother for now
english.segment5: Hug him like a brother. Kiss her like a sister. Let it be my mother. Let it be my father. I will be her brother. Kiss her like a sister. Come and be my mother forever
